original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su lhung nas byang chub chen po'i gegs byed pa dang : bya ba'i las thams cad don med par 'gyur ba dang : sngar bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi dpung thams cad zad par 'gyur ba dang : rtag tu mi ma yin rnams kyis 'tshhe ba dang :

original: 'gyod pa'i gnas ma yin pa rjes su yi rang ba'i yul gzhan dge ba'i rtsha ba rgya chen po byed pa la 'gyod pa bskyed pa'i bsam pa sngon du song bas :

original: de bas lhag pa yod de lta bu ma legs zhes 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang : sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khros kun nas bslangs nas skyon brjod kyi tshhigs su bcad pa byas pa dang : yul sems can gzhan la snying rje dang bral bas g.yo sgyu byas pa rnams :

analyzed: sems can la khro ba dang rdeg ba las byed ba gnyen por rtag tu zhi ba dang dul ba phan dogs ba dang bkur gnas slu ba gnyen por sems can thams cad sangs rgya kyi byang chub chen por gyur ba dge ba rtsha ba la god ba dang

original: khong khros skyon brjod pa'i gnyen por theg pa chen po'i gang zag rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bstod pa dang : sems can la g.yo sgyu'i gnyen por thams cad la bsam pa rnam par dag pas rang sems dpang du btshugs te gnas par bya ba rnams rten cig :
